title: Socail Media Clone
description: A small clone of a social media platform that allows users to share posts and interact with other users.

title: Task Flow
description: Each day the admin refrech the tasks and the users can see the tasks and take it and when they finish it they can mark it as done.

title: Book Trading Website
description: A website that allows users to trade books with each other. Users can add their book to listing with their contact info.
